Clothing.Details: It's free to collect in store. Available collection dates and stores will be made clear to you at checkout.Orders can be collected from 12pm on your chosen day. Stores will hold for 7 days

We'll deliver for free if your order is over £50 (exclusions apply), within 3-5 working days. We'll aim to deliver earlier if possible. If you're not spending £50 then delivery is £3.50. To find out if this delivery option is available to your postcode, click here. You can view your order and access any tracking details in My Account.

Choose a day that suits you. Order by 10pm and we'll deliver your order tomorrow for just £4.99. To find out if this delivery option is available to your postcode, click here. You can view your order and access any tracking details in My Account

Flower.Details: Order by 7pm weekdays or midday on weekends for next day delivery or choose a day that suits you. Sunday delivery on selected lines only. Order hampers by 5pm Monday-Friday for next day delivery. Sunday delivery not available. To find out if this delivery option is available to your postcode, click here. . You can view your order and access any tracking details in My Account.

Furniture.Details: Our furniture products have a note in the description to let you know the time it will take us to dispatch - this could be between one and six weeks, and will be longer for larger items. Once you’ve ordered, we’ll be in touch to make a plan for delivery - you can choose the delivery date and inform us of access requirements. There are some places in the UK that we can’t deliver to yet.See our list of exceptions here
